This app demonstrates:

1. All parameters of `update_action_link`:
   - `id`: Required parameter to identify which link to update
   - `label`: Optional parameter to change the link's text
   - `icon`: Optional parameter to add/change the link's icon
   - `session`: Optional parameter (defaults to current session)

2. The app includes:
   - An action link that will be updated
   - A button to trigger the updates
   - A text display showing the current state
   - A reactive effect that updates the link when the button is clicked

3. The app uses express mode for simplicity and directness

4. No external files or data are used

To run this app, you'll need to add the Font Awesome CSS to the page. Here's the complete version with the required Font Awesome setup:

This app demonstrates a minimal yet complete implementation showing all parameters of `update_action_link`. When you click the update button:
1. The link's label will change to show how many times it's been updated
2. An arrow icon will be added/updated
3. The text display will show how many times the link itself has been clicked

The app uses only the components necessary to demonstrate `update_action_link` functionality, avoiding unnecessary complexity.
